experience.title: Finance Technology Intern
experience.company: Hyundai Motor Group Innovation Centre Singapore (HMGICS)
description: Developed a comprehensive data pipeline for scraping and visualizing car and COE prices, enabling data-driven decision-making.
Designed and implemented a scalable claim system for employee petrol claims, streamlining the process and enhancing efficiency for the finance department.

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
description: Collaborated with 3 other developers to develop and maintain e-commerce website and vendor website, utilizing Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
Designed and implemented a robust database system using Prisma and wrote tRPC APIs to ensure seamless and 100% type-safe interactions between client and server.
